x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script provides the ability for exisiting customers to opt in for restricting scrum_master, scrum_admin from adding members to group, If the system property 'scrum.disallow_scrum_add_group_member' is set to true - scrum_master, scrum_admin are not allowed to add members to group. If the property is set to false or doesn't exist, scrum_master, scrum_admin will have the ability to add members to group.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Fix Scrum add/delete member to group ACL
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.sys_name: Fix Scrum add/delete member to group ACL

sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts"><x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>This fix script provides the ability for exisiting customers to opt in for restricting scrum_master, scrum_admin from adding members to group, If the system property 'scrum.disallow_scrum_add_group_member' is set to true - scrum_master, scrum_admin are not allowed to add members to group. If the property is set to false or doesn't exist, scrum_master, scrum_admin will have the ability to add members to group.</description><name>Fix Scrum add/delete member to group ACL</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[updateScrumAdminACL(); gs.log('Finished ]]></script><sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 15:08:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>96b67b8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fix Scrum add/delete member to group ACL</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_96b67b8c83e89e50c6695855eeaad3da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 15:08:10</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts></record_update>
